entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 900 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
